translations: 闺房；女人的会客室或化妆室

sentences.sentence: Oh, the mansions, the lights, the perfume, the loaded boudoirs and tables!
sentences.translation: 啊，那些高楼大厦、华灯、香水、藏金收银的闺房还有摆满山珍海味的餐桌！

sentences.sentence: The court-style poems reflect the psychological features of boudoirs by means of time image, space image and metaphor image, etc.
sentences.translation: 宫体诗通过对时间意象、空间意象、隐喻意象的截取，以体物寓情的手法表现深闺女性的心理。
